subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Breeding of Animals
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Doping (Sports)
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Big Brown won two-thirds of horse racing’s Triple Crown in 2008, but questions about steroids and the financial dealings of his owners have clouded his legacy.
snippet: Big Brown won two-thirds of horse racing’s Triple Crown in 2008, but questions about steroids and the financial dealings of his owners have clouded his legacy.
